verses.verse: By the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, There we sat <S%H3427>down<s%>, <S%H1058>yea<s%>, we wept, When we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
Upon the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof We <S%H8518>hanged<s%> up our <S%H3658>harps<s%>.

For there they that led us <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H7592>required<s%> of us <S%H1697>songs<s%>, And they that <S%H8437>wasted<s%> us required of us <S%H8057>mirth<s%>, <S%H7891>saying<s%>, Sing us one of the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
If I <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3389>thee<s%>, O Jerusalem, Let my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> forget her <S%H7911>skill<s%>.

Let my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the roof of my <S%H2441>mouth<s%>, If I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee <S%H5927>not<s%>; If I prefer not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> Above my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy<s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; Who <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6168>Rase<s%> <S%H6168>it<s%>, rase <S%H3247>it<s%>, Even to the foundation thereof.
O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, that art to be <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>, <S%H835>Happy<s%> shall he <S%H7999>be<s%>, that rewardeth thee As thou hast served <S%H1580>us<s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he <S%H270>be<s%>, that taketh and <S%H5310>dasheth<s%> thy little <S%H5768>ones<s%> Against the <S%H5553>rock<s%>.
